history.proof: intros n m. induction n. - simpl. qsimpl. - qsimpl use: le_0_n.

exceptions.exn: In environment m : nat Unable to unify "?M1855 * ?M1857 <= ?M1856 * ?M1858" with "0 <= 0".
In environment n, m : nat IHn : n * m <= n * S m Unable to unify "0 <= ?M1855" with "S n * m <= S n * S m".

original: intros n m. induction n. - simpl. apply Nat.mul_le_mono_nonneg. + apply le_0_n. + auto. - simpl. apply Nat.le_le_succ_r in IHn. apply (Nat.mul_lt_mono_pos_l n (S n) m). + apply le_0_n. + auto. + auto. + auto.
